participant_1.background:
My favorite websites are those that help me learn more about asthma and how to manage it.
i also enjoy reading the game of thrones series books.
I'm a writer, looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories.
i like listening to blues music.
I spend my day trying to stay away from cigarettes and doing things that make me happy.

participant_2.background:
After I quit my job, I used my free time to start rock collecting and making macaroni art.
i want to go back to school.
I spend time with my mom and my dog and enjoy a little gossip.
i love kids.
i live on an island.

content.text: Hi, my name is Sara! What's yours?
Hi Sara! My name is Mike. It's nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too, Mike! What do you do for a living?
I'm a writer, trying to find a job to support myself while I work on my own stories.
That's really cool! I used to be a writer, but I quit my job to focus on other things.
What other things do you focus on?
I started rock collecting and making macaroni art. I also love spending time with my mom and my dog.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love going to the beach and collecting seashells.
Oh, I love the beach! I live on an island, so I'm always close to the ocean.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to live on an island.
It's definitely a different lifestyle, but it's very laid back and relaxing.
I'm sure it is! I'd love to visit one day.
You're welcome to come visit me anytime! I'd love to show you around.
Thanks, Sara! I'd love to take you up on that offer someday.
Sounds good! Until then, have a great day, Mike!
